entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Bancroft
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:17 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High 6 with temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning this afternoon then changing to flurries at times heavy later this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 80 late this afternoon. High 6 with temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 20 near midnight then light after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
